name: Winter Campaign
description: For the next 2 turns, each time you are attacked, your opponent discards a card and one random buff they have is reduced in duration by 1.

hooks.OnTakeDamage: if (OpponentHand.Count > 0) { int idx = Rng.Next(OpponentHand.Count); var discarded = OpponentHand[idx]; OpponentHand.RemoveAt(idx); OpponentDiscard.Add(discarded); Log(OpponentDisplayName + " loses " + discarded.Name + " to the winter!"); } var buffs = GetBuffs(Opponent); if (buffs.Count > 0) { var buff = buffs[Rng.Next(buffs.Count)]; buff.RemainingDuration -= 1; Log(OpponentDisplayName + "'s " + buff.Name + " weakens in the cold!"); }
